actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Power and Offshore Energy Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Power and Offshore Energy Resources

official_title: To prohibit the Department of the Interior from expending any further funds for the proposed Mid-Atlantic coast offshore oil and gas lease sale number 121.

summary.text: Prohibits any expenditure of funds by the Department of the Interior for pre-leasing and leasing activities for certain lands identified for proposed Oil and Gas Lease Sale 121 published in the Federal Register notice dated September 30, 1987.

titles.title: To prohibit the Department of the Interior from expending any further funds for the proposed Mid-Atlantic coast offshore oil and gas lease sale number 121.
